name: Banana Martyr
description:
You are doomed. But you will not be eaten by these primates unless they peel you first! Fight in the arena, survive... as long as you can. (Please try lasting 60secs for a surprise)

CONTROLS

Move with Left/Right Arrows OR A/S.

Punch the monkey with E OR Mouse left click.

Jump with SPACEBAR.

Credits:

- Jamie (@Jamie) Carolan / Sound Design
